```{r}
swm_html = 
  read_html("https://www.imdb.com/list/ls070150896/")
```

```{r}
title_vec = 
  swm_html |>
  html_elements(".lister-item-header a") |>
  html_text()

gross_rev_vec = 
  swm_html |>
  html_elements(".text-small:nth-child(7) span:nth-child(5)") |>
  html_text()

runtime_vec = 
  swm_html |>
  html_elements(".runtime") |>
  html_text()

swm_df = 
  tibble(
    title = title_vec,
    rev = gross_rev_vec,
    runtime = runtime_vec)
```
